dataTemplate.name: BCO_ORIGIN_CERT_MPLS_CHAMBER
dataTemplate.description: BCO Origin Certificate Minneapolis Chamber of Commerce

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMonth DD, YYYY') booking_date, obrns1.ob_refnum_value shipper, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns2.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrns2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns3.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns4.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrns4.ob_refnum_value END) shipper_address, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns5.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrns5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns6.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns7.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns8.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns8.ob_refnum_value END) s_city_state_zip, obr1.remark_text lc_num, TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMonth DD, YYYY') on_board_date, TRIM(cv.voyage_name || ' ' || cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value) vessel, obrn1.ob_refnum_value party, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn2.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn3.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn4.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrn4.ob_refnum_value END) address, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn5.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn6.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn7.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn8.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || (SELECT country_name FROM country_code WHERE country_code3_gid = obrn8.ob_refnum_value) END) city_state_zip, (SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER') ref_num, (SELECT sr.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sr WHERE sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' AND sr.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND rownum = 1) bl_num, (CASE WHEN l1.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(l1.city || ', ' || l1.province_code || ' ' || cc1.country_name) ELSE TRIM(l1.city || ' ' || cc1.country_name) END) load_port, (CASE WHEN l2.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(l2.city || ', ' || l2.province_code || ' ' || cc2.country_name) ELSE TRIM(l2.city || ' ' || cc2.country_name) END) discharge_port, obr3.remark_text delivery_port, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit sunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT sunit.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1), '999,999,999')) || ' X ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR( (SELECT ssu.received_ship_unit_count FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) ,'999,999')) || ' FT CONTAINERS' quantity, obr2.remark_text description, TRIM(TO_CHAR( (SELECT SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1) , '999,999,990.000') || 'MT') net_weight FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON s.shipment_gid = vsob.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON vsob.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns1.order_base_gid AND obrns1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns2.order_base_gid AND obrns2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns3.order_base_gid AND obrns3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns4 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns4.order_base_gid AND obrns4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns5 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns5.order_base_gid AND obrns5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns6 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns6.order_base_gid AND obrns6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns7 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns7.order_base_gid AND obrns7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns8 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns8.order_base_gid AND obrns8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER COUNTRY CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn1.order_base_gid AND obrn1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NOTIFY NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn2.order_base_gid AND obrn2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn3.order_base_gid AND obrn3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn4 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn4.order_base_gid AND obrn4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn5 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn5.order_base_gid AND obrn5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn6 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn6.order_base_gid AND obrn6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn7 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn7.order_base_gid AND obrn7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn8 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn8.order_base_gid AND obrn8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP COUNTRY CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr1.order_base_gid AND obr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT NUM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr2.order_base_gid AND obr2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_COMMODITY DETAIL' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr3.order_base_gid AND obr3.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_DESTINATION PORT' LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON s.port_of_load_location_gid = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc1 ON l1.country_code3_gid = cc1.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l2 ON s.port_of_dis_location_gid = l2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc2 ON l2.country_code3_gid = cc2.country_code3_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMonth DD, YYYY'), 'Data Missing in System') booking_date, NVL(obrns1.ob_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') shipper, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns2.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE ((CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns2.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrns2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns3.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns4.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrns4.ob_refnum_value END)) END) shipper_address, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns5.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE ((CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns5.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrns5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns6.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns7.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns8.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns8.ob_refnum_value END)) END) s_city_state_zip, NVL(obr1.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') lc_num, NVL(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMonth DD, YYYY'), 'Data Missing in System') on_board_date, NVL(TRIM(cv.voyage_name || ' ' || cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value), 'Data Missing in System') vessel, NVL(obrn1.ob_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') party, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn2.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE ((CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn2.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn3.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn4.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrn4.ob_refnum_value END)) END) address, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn5.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE ((CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn5.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn6.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn7.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn8.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || (SELECT country_name FROM country_code WHERE country_code3_gid = obrn8.ob_refnum_value) END)) END) city_state_zip, NVL((SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER'), 'Data Missing in System') ref_num, NVL((SELECT sr.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sr WHERE sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' AND sr.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND rownum = 1), 'Data Missing in System') bl_num, (CASE WHEN l1.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(NVL(l1.city, 'Data Missing in System') || ', ' || NVL(l1.province_code, 'Data Missing in System') || ' ' || cc1.country_name) ELSE NVL(TRIM(l1.city || ' ' || cc1.country_name), 'Data Missing in System') END) load_port, (CASE WHEN l2.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(NVL(l2.city, 'Data Missing in System') || ', ' || NVL(l2.province_code, 'Data Missing in System') || ' ' || cc2.country_name) ELSE NVL(TRIM(l2.city || ' ' || cc2.country_name), 'Data Missing in System') END) discharge_port, NVL(obr3.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') delivery_port, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit sunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT sunit.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1) = 0 THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit sunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT sunit.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1), '999,999,999')) || ' X ' || NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR( (SELECT ssu.received_ship_unit_count FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) ,'999,999')), 'Data Missing in System') || ' FT CONTAINERS' END) quantity, NVL(obr2.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') description, TRIM(NVL(TO_CHAR( (SELECT SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1) , '999,999,990.000'), 'Data Missing in System') || 'MT') net_weight FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON s.shipment_gid = vsob.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON vsob.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns1.order_base_gid AND obrns1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns2.order_base_gid AND obrns2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns3.order_base_gid AND obrns3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns4 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns4.order_base_gid AND obrns4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns5 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns5.order_base_gid AND obrns5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns6 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns6.order_base_gid AND obrns6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns7 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns7.order_base_gid AND obrns7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns8 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns8.order_base_gid AND obrns8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER COUNTRY CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn1.order_base_gid AND obrn1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NOTIFY NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn2.order_base_gid AND obrn2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn3.order_base_gid AND obrn3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn4 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn4.order_base_gid AND obrn4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn5 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn5.order_base_gid AND obrn5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn6 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn6.order_base_gid AND obrn6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn7 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn7.order_base_gid AND obrn7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn8 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn8.order_base_gid AND obrn8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP COUNTRY CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr1.order_base_gid AND obr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT NUM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr2.order_base_gid AND obr2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_COMMODITY DETAIL' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr3.order_base_gid AND obr3.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_DESTINATION PORT' LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON s.port_of_load_location_gid = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc1 ON l1.country_code3_gid = cc1.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l2 ON s.port_of_dis_location_gid = l2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc2 ON l2.country_code3_gid = cc2.country_code3_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'
